name: NX Biometry
description: Package that enables secure authentication using available biometric methods like fingerprint or face ID.

name: NX Payments
description: Package that provides interfaces for integrating popular payment systems such as Google Pay and Apple Pay into your app.

name: NX Profile
description: Package that provides functionalities to manage user profiles, including the ability to edit user data, update profile photos, modify account settings, and change passwords.

name: NX Authentication
description: Package that provides user authentication features, allowing users to register, sign in, and recover their account with a forgot password feature.

name: NX Calendar
description: Package that allows users to choose single dates or date ranges, and check which time slots are available.

name: NX Sequrify
description: Package that allows to verify vulnerabilities in Flutter packages. It provides information about the latest scans and presents the score for stability, vulnerability and quality indexes.

name: NX Feedback
description: Package that provides a panel to give feedback or report a problem.

name: NX UI
description: Package that provides UI widgets such as filters, search bar, drawer, buttons, expandable text, shimmer box, snackbar, photo card, empty screen.
